forgot.title: Forgot Password
forgot.description: Forgot your password? No problem. Just let us know your email address and we will email you a password reset link that will allow you to choose a new one.

confirm.label: Confirm Password
confirm.title: Confirm Password
confirm.description: For your security, please confirm your password to continue.

update.label: Update Password
update.title: Update Password
update.description: Ensure your account is using a long, random password to stay secure

verify.label: Verify Email
verify.title: Email Verification
verify.description: Before continuing, could you verify your email address by clicking on the link we just emailed to you? If you didn't receive the email, we will gladly send you another.
verify.linkSent: A new verification link has been sent to the email address you provided in your profile settings.
verify.verifyLink: Click here to re-send the verification email.
verify.verifyLinkSentMessage: A new verification link has been sent to your email address.

delete.label: Delete Profile
delete.title: Delete Profile
delete.warning: Once your account is deleted, all of its resources and data will be permanently deleted. Before deleting your account, please download any data or information that you wish to retain.
delete.areYouSure: Are you sure you want to delete your account? Once your account is deleted, all of its resources and data will be permanently deleted. Please enter your password to confirm you would like to permanently delete your account.

information.title: Account Information
information.description: Update your account's profile information and email address.

otherDevices.title: Browser Sessions
otherDevices.description: Manage and log out your active sessions on other browsers and devices.
otherDevices.info: If necessary, you may log out of all of your other browser sessions across all of your devices. Some of your recent sessions are listed below; however, this list may not be exhaustive. If you feel your account has been compromised, you should also update your password.

modal.title: Log Out of Browser Sessions
modal.description: Please enter your password to confirm you would like to log out of your other browser sessions across all of your devices.

twoFactorAuth.title: Two Factor Authentication
twoFactorAuth.description: Add additional security to your account using two factor authentication.

confirm.title: Two Factor Authentication
confirm.description: Please confirm access to your account by entering the authentication code provided by your authenticator application.
confirm.emergencyCodes: Please confirm access to your account by entering one of your emergency recovery codes.

enabled.title: You have enabled two factor authentication.
enabled.description: Two factor authentication is now enabled. Scan the following QR code using your phone's authenticator application.
enabled.info: Store these recovery codes in a secure password manager. They can be used to recover access to your account if your two factor authentication device is lost.

disabled.title: You have not enabled two factor authentication.
disabled.description: When two factor authentication is enabled, you will be prompted for a secure, random token during authentication. You may retrieve this token from your phone's Google Authenticator application.

finish.title: Finish enabling two factor authentication.
finish.description: To finish enabling two factor authentication, scan the following QR code using your phone's authenticator application or enter the setup key and provide the generated OTP code.

create.title: Create API Token
create.description: API tokens allow third-party services to authenticate with our application on your behalf.

manage.title: Manage API Tokens
manage.description: You may delete any of your existing tokens if they are no longer needed.

delete.title: Delete API Token
delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete this API token?

view.description: Please copy your new API token. For your security, it won't be shown again.

identity.title: Team Identity
identity.description: The team's name and owner information.

delete.label: Delete Team
delete.title: Delete Team
delete.warning: Once a team is deleted, all of its resources and data will be permanently deleted. Before deleting this team, please download any data or information regarding this team that you wish to retain.
delete.areYouSure: Are you sure you want to delete this team? Once a team is deleted, all of its resources and data will be permanently deleted.

member.title: Team Members
member.description: All of the people that are part of this team.

add.title: Add Team Member
add.description: Add a new team member to your team, allowing them to collaborate with you.
add.provideEmail: Please provide the email address of the person you would like to add to this team.

pending.title: Pending Team Invitations
pending.description: These people have been invited to your team and have been sent an invitation email. They may join the team by accepting the email invitation.

leave.title: Leave Team
leave.areYouSure: Are you sure you would like to leave this team?

remove.title: Remove Team Member
remove.areYouSure: Are you sure you would like to remove this person from the team?

teamDetails.title: Team Details
teamDetails.description: Create a new team to collaborate with others on projects.

language.title: Display Language
language.description: You can change the display language.
